members.member:
POST: api/Admin
Create a book entity
Sample request (this request post a new book entity)
Returns Ok response in respect to the successive creation of a new book entity

member.name: M:BookStore.Controllers.UserController.GetBook
member.summary: Return the list of the book entities
member.remarks: Sample request (this request get the list of all the books)

member.name: M:BookStore.Controllers.UserController.GetBookByTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of books with the same title
member.remarks: Sample request (this request get the list of all the books)
member.response: Returns the list of books with the same title

member.name: M:BookStore.Controllers.UserController.GetBookByIsbn(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of books with the same Isbn
member.remarks: Sample request (this request get the list of all the books)
member.response: Returns the list of books with the same Isbn
